BrightBlade, Rage

* BrightBlade sighed as she leaned against Gangon's chest, the pain in her 
own chest was subsiding and she was slowly gaining strength.
She looked up into her partner's face and saw that he had completely blacked 
out, she sighed again...figures!
BrightBlade couldn't help but notice that she didn't feel right there, 
either because she was leaning against Gangon or because she was missing out 
on the battle...she didn't know. All she really knew now was that there was 
a battle out there that they had to win and she wanted to be a part of that, 
even though they did have the upper hand now.
BrightBlade smiled as she had heard the explosion from their spot, now they 
really did have the upper hand!
She slowly leaned away from Gangon and stood up, the wound in her chest now 
only a dull pain but still present.
BrightBlade looked down at Gangon and wondered if she should wake him, but 
then she decided against the idea...he needed his rest.
She then walked from the protection of the boulder with a snarl, the search 
for another victim was now underway!*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage jumped as she heard a loud explosion from the huge metal thing a few 
yards away, she looked at Scourge...*

" What.....that?"
